Mod.name: Copi's gun
Mod.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5aDRWYk.png[/img]
[HR][/HR] Replaces your starter wand with the Glock 17, a powerful handgun. You are equipped with an unlimited supply of 17 bullet magazines filled with silver 9mm shots, which automatically reload upon depletion. Armed and ready, seek revenge on those magic, tech, and nature bastards who wronged you. The silver shots will hurt anything they touch, assuming it isn't invulnerable.
[u][b][i]Content[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]One Glock 17 [list][*]$579.99[/list] [*]Seventeen 99.9% pure silver 9mm Minuteman ammunition bullets [list][*]$2,549.15[/list] [*]Subtotal [list][*]$3129.14[/list] [*]Total [list][*]$3442.054[/list] [/list] [i]Thank you for your purchase! Please come again.[/i]
